abort.august_integration_missing: The August integration must be set up before configuring the August Access Helper Integration.
abort.account_not_connected: August Account is not connected in Seam. Please try again.
abort.workspace_mismatch: The configured workspace is different from the Seam workspace identified by the supplied API key.

user.title: Seam Configuration
user.description:
To use the August Access integration, you must have an August account and an API key from Seam. You can obtain an API key by signing up at [{ url }]({ url }). Once you have your API key, enter it below to configure the integration.

See the documentation for more details [August Access Integration Configuration](TBD)

error.invalid_api_key: The provided Seam API key is invalid.
error.no_august_locks: No August locks were found in your Seam account.
